article.p: sblg will generate Atom feeds when given the -a flag. These are used for syndication (I guess – I've never used it). All you need to do is provide an Atom template; the entry and updated fields will be automatically filled in.
Entries consist of title, id, updated, author, and alternate link elements.
Remember to link to the feed in your blog-template.xml or article-template.xml file!
